name: The Secret of NecroNancy
storyline: You are Nancilla… (She hates being called Nancy.) your everyday, average, typical girl questing for spells to bring your parents, pets, and annoying little brother back from the dead. If only those pesky Paladins were not guarding the spells in their Fortress.
summary: Necronancy is an undead summoning puzzle platformer. You cannot attack the heavily armored knights yourself. So you will need to learn how to summon minions like Mr Bones, Skello Kitty, Chompers, and other unspeakable skeletal abominations to clear the path forward.
